title: Kinda Funny Jumps Into Diablo Immortal
description:
Joey and Greg introduce Andy and Mike to Diablo Immortal. Hang out with the crew as they hit the grind in the latest Diablo installment and then switch over to Fortnite for the second half of the stream once Greg leaves to react to Black Adam. 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
